A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left this film disappointed and un-impressed. Rian Johnson was paid by Disney to make a very long Disney commercial. He did not treat the Star Wars saga story with any kind of respect. He just made up new characters and throws out fundamental characters that have been around since the 70s. What a disrespect. What a let down. I honestly cant believe they dropped the ball on this. JJ ABRAMS IS YOUR ONLY HOPE\, Disney.
